card_text: 2+ Level 4 monsters$NYou can Tribute 1 monster; Special Summon 1 Level 4 "Mathmech" monster from your hand or GY. If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can detach 2 to 4 materials from this card, then activate the appropriate effect;$N●2: Add 1 "Mathmech" card from your Deck to your hand.$N●3: Add 1 Level 4 monster from your Deck to your hand.$N●4: Add 1 Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.$NYou can only use each effect of "Primathmech Alembertian" once per turn.
